name: Sing for Absolution
wikiSummary: Sing For Absolution is the fourth track on Absolution, and the third single from the album. Often found in the opening few songs of the Absolution Tour, the song and video continues the theme of Absolution, the apocalypse.
wikiText: Sing For Absolution is the fourth track on Absolution, and the third single from the album. Often found in the opening few songs of the Absolution Tour, the song and video continues the theme of Absolution, the apocalypse.
